  • Method Details

    • addNewUser

      public void addNewUser(User user) throws ServiceException, DuplicatedEntityException
      Method adds the User to a storage. Before adding the User to it, method checks if email of that user does not exist in that storage.
      Parameters:
      user - that has to be added to a storage.
      Throws:
      DuplicatedEntityException - if the user with such email is already exist in a storage.
      ServiceException - if any Exception situation occurs while adding user to a storage.

    • getUserFromDatabase

      public User getUserFromDatabase(String email) throws ServiceException
      Method gets the user from storage by email.
      Parameters:
      email - of the user that User entity has to be received from a storage.
      Returns:
      User that received from storage by email.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if User with such email doesn't exist in a storage.
      ServiceException - if any Exception situation occurs while receiving user from storage.

    • checkIfEmailDoesNotExist

      private void checkIfEmailDoesNotExist(User user, UserDao userDao) throws ServiceException, DAOException
      Checking for User email uniqueness before registration that User. Trying to get from database user with the same email (login), if it presents there method throws DuplicatedEntityException with correspondent message
      Parameters:
      user - whose email needs to be checked for uniqueness.
      userDao - Data Access Object instance that doing such trying to get user by email.
      Throws:
      DAOException - if any Exception situation occurs while receiving user from a storage.
      DuplicatedEntityException - if the user with such email is already exist in a storage.
      ServiceException
